description: The current state for a measurement. A state value is an instance of a measurement from a specific source. Measurements can be associated with many state values, each representing a different source for the measurement.

contents.name: MeasurementValueSource
contents.description: The MeasurementValues updated by the source.

contents.name: sensorAccuracy
contents.description: The limit, expressed as a percentage of the sensor maximum, that errors will not exceed when the sensor is used under  reference conditions.

contents.name: timeStamp
contents.description: The time when the value was last updated
